about_first: Over the past two years, I have worked tirelessly to transition into the tech industry as a JavaScript developer. I successfully completed the JavaScript Web Developer path at SoftUni with a perfect score of 6.00 and received my diploma, demonstrating my expertise in JavaScript, DOM manipulation, RESTful APIs, and full-stack development.
about_second: While currently employed in a different field, I am fully committed to transitioning into a career as a full-stack JavaScript developer. I am passionate about learning new technologies, building impactful solutions, and continuously growing as a developer every day.
title_1_text: Crafting interactive and high-performance web applications using JavaScript and React. Leveraging modern libraries and frameworks to build dynamic user interfaces and enhance overall functionality.
title_2_text: Building dynamic, data-driven web applications with expertise in both front-end and back-end technologies. From user interfaces to server-side logic, I create seamless experiences that drive results.
title_3_text: Create fast and scalable backends with Express and MongoDB, building efficient RESTful APIs and managing data with ease.
title_4_text: Seamlessly connecting front-end applications with back-end services to deliver dynamic and data-driven user experiences.
title_5_text: Build secure and feature-rich e-commerce platforms with seamless product management, payment integration, and user-friendly shopping experiences.
title_6_text: Creating user-friendly websites that adapt seamlessly to any device, ensuring an optimal experience across desktops, tablets, and mobile screens.
